name: Dark Vader Beta 🖤💛
description:
Design in one theme & automate the rest

A plugin that helps you keep your Design System simpler in one theme. Enables you to automate any other themes with a few clicks. Works for you and your team across all your projects.


  • Easily switch hundreds of layers to any theme
  • Compatible with any Design System
  • Not only for dark mode but for any theme
  • One-time setup
  • Works for the whole team


👉 How to use it https://darkvader.zerox.me/

👩‍💻 The plugin is in Beta, so for any errors or feedback, please reach out on twitter @zerox_me
